Package util.linalg

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BidiagonalDecomposition
    A class implementing a bidiagonal decomposition.
    CholeskyFactorization
    Calculates A = L*Lt where A is a symmetric positive definite matrix and L is a lower triangular matrix.
    DenseVector
    An implementation of a vector that is dense
    DiagonalMatrix
    A diagonal matrix is a matrix that only has a diagonal
    GivensRotation
    A class representing a givens rotations, which is a matrix of the form G = [ ...
    HessenbergDecomposition
    An implementation of the hessenberg decomposition which decomposes a square matrix A into U * H * Ut where H is a upper hessenberg matrix and U is a orthonormal matrix.
    HouseholderReflection
    A class representing a householder reflection, a matrix of the form P = I - beta * v * vt for some column vector v and some scalar beta equal to 2/ (vt * v).
    LowerTriangularMatrix
    A class representing a lower triangular matrix
    LUDecomposition
    A class for performing a LU decomposition.
    Matrix
    A class representing a matrix, with linear algebra operations
    QRDecomposition
    A class for performing the QR decomposition with householder reflections.
    RealSchurDecomposition
    An implementation of a unsymmetric eigenvalue decomposition.
    RectangularMatrix
    A general rectangular matrix class
    SingularValueDecomposition
    A class for performing singular value decompositions of matrices.
    SymmetricEigenvalueDecomposition
    A symmetric eigenvalue decomposition decomposes a symmetric matrix A = U*D*Ut where D is a diagonal matrix of eigenvalues and U is a orthonormal
    TridiagonalDecomposition
    A tridiagonal decomposition that decomposes a symmetric matrix A into U*T*Ut where T is tridiagonal and U is a orthonormal matrix.
    UpperTriangularMatrix
    A class respresenting a upper triangular matrix
    Vector
    A class representing a vector with linear algebra operations.
